Package com.library.frontend.controllers.operator

Class OperatorBooksController

java.lang.Object
com.library.frontend.controllers.operator.OperatorBooksController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Controller, javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class OperatorBooksController extends Object implements Controller
Controller for managing operator tasks related to books, including searching, archiving, and handling book forms.
